page.title: 01ILMINSTER AND DISTRICT
page.content: We live in a rural area. Our block is mainly agricultural but also includes three villages and part of a small market town. Many people work outside the area, although the market town provides jobs in offices and shops.It also has four main factories,one of which produces cheese, milk supplies being obtained from local dairy farms. However recently there has been a major switch locally to arable farming. There are two playschools and two primary schools in our block,a bus provides transport for children from other villages.Most families have one or possibly two cars and there is a daily bus service to larger towns nearby.Ours is a peaceful area,with little crime.
